title: Account takeover via phishing
scenario: User clicks phishing link -> creds captured -> attacker accesses cloud apps/data
vulnerability: Weak MFA coverage, user awareness gaps
actions: Enforce MFA for all; conditional access; phishing awareness; disable legacy auth

title: BEC / invoice fraud
scenario: Attacker spoofs supplier email -> finance pays fake invoice
actions: 2-person approval; out-of-band vendor bank change verification; DMARC rollout

title: Ransomware via remote access
scenario: Stolen creds or vuln on VPN/RDP -> lateral move -> encryption
actions: Patch/VPN hardening; MFA; restrict admin access; segmentation; EDR rollout

title: Backup compromise / no recovery
vulnerability: Backups not immutable, restore not tested
actions: Immutable/offline backups; separate creds; monthly restore test; backup monitoring
notes: Recovery is a control, not a hope

title: Privileged account misuse
vulnerability: Shared admin accounts, no PAM, weak logging
actions: Unique admin accounts; PAM lite; just-in-time; audit logs; break-glass process

title: Data leakage via cloud sharing
scenario: Sensitive docs shared publicly by mistake
actions: Block external sharing by default; classification; DLP lite; periodic access review

title: Unpatched endpoints exploited
scenario: Malware exploits outdated software on laptops
actions: Patch SLA; auto-update; inventory; remove local admin; EDR

title: Lost/stolen laptop exposes data
vulnerability: No full disk encryption, weak MDM
actions: BitLocker; MDM; remote wipe; conditional access for compliant devices

title: Supplier compromise impacts services
scenario: Vendor breach -> access to org data/services
vulnerability: No vendor security review, weak contracts
actions: Vendor questionnaire; contract clauses; access minimization; annual review

title: Insufficient logging & detection
scenario: Attack happens but not detected quickly
actions: Centralize logs; define top alerts; incident playbooks; quarterly tabletop

title: Weak incident response readiness
actions: IR plan; RACI; contact list; tabletop exercise; evidence preservation guide

title: Public portal vulnerability
scenario: Web vuln exploited -> data leak / defacement
actions: Basic SAST/DAST; patch cadence; WAF rules; vuln disclosure process
